Notification.Name: DoNotUseSPWebProperties
Notification.Message: Do not use SPWeb.Properties in method 'SetProperty', class 'MyCompany.Intranet.Components.CustomCode.SPWebProperties'. Use the SPWeb.AllProperties property instead.
Notification.Description: SPWeb.Properties is a StringDictionary and doesn't support casing for keys/values (everything gets converted to lowercase). Instead use SPWeb.AllProperties. SPWeb.AllProperties is a Hashtable and supports additional types of data.

Notification.Name: DefineUniqueFieldId
Notification.Message: ID '{C64E738E-C093-495C-9B32-BB944948D82E}' of Field 'InternalField3' in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_Actions' is used multiple times. Field InternalField in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_InternalFields' uses same id '{C64E738E-C093-495C-9B32-BB944948D82E}'
Notification.Description: The ID of a Field must be unique in the farm.

Notification.Name: DefineUniqueFieldId
Notification.Message: ID '{32E36ECB-69DF-46B0-9FC3-D4C8A33C4EFC}' of Field 'HiddenPageField' in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_InternalFields' is used multiple times. Field HiddenPageField in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_InternalFields' uses same id '{32E36ECB-69DF-46B0-9FC3-D4C8A33C4EFC}'
Notification.Description: The ID of a Field must be unique in the farm.

Notification.Name: DefineUniqueFieldId
Notification.Message: ID '{C64E738E-C093-495C-9B32-BB944948D82E}' of Field 'InternalField' in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_InternalFields' is used multiple times. Field InternalField3 in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_Actions' uses same id '{C64E738E-C093-495C-9B32-BB944948D82E}'
Notification.Description: The ID of a Field must be unique in the farm.

Notification.Name: DeclareAllRequiredAttributesInFields
Notification.Message: Add missing attribute 'Type' to field 'HiddenPageField'.
Notification.Description: Required attributes ID, Name and Type must be declared in Field.

Notification.Name: DeclareAllRequiredAttributesInFields
Notification.Message: Add missing attribute 'Type' to field 'InternalField'.
Notification.Description: Required attributes ID, Name and Type must be declared in Field.

Notification.Name: DeclareAllRecommendedAttributesInFields
Notification.Message: Add missing attribute 'Type' to field 'HiddenPageField'.
Notification.Description: All recommended attributes ID, Type, Name, DisplayName, and Group should be declared in Field.

Notification.Name: DeclareAllRecommendedAttributesInFields
Notification.Message: Add missing attribute 'Type' to field 'InternalField'.
Notification.Description: All recommended attributes ID, Type, Name, DisplayName, and Group should be declared in Field.

Notification.Name: DefineUniqueFieldName
Notification.Message: Attribute 'Name' of Field 'HiddenPageField' in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_InternalFields' is used multiple times. Field HiddenPageField in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_InternalFields' uses same Name 'HiddenPageField'
Notification.Description: The Name of a Field should be unique in the farm.

Notification.Name: DefineUniqueFieldName
Notification.Message: Attribute 'Name' of Field 'HiddenPageField' in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_InternalFields' is used multiple times. Field HiddenPageField in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_InternalFields' uses same Name 'HiddenPageField'
Notification.Description: The Name of a Field should be unique in the farm.

Notification.Name: DefineUniqueFieldStaticName
Notification.Message: Attribute 'StaticName' of Field 'HiddenPageField' in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_InternalFields' is used multiple times. Field HiddenPageField in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_InternalFields' uses same StaticName 'HiddenPageField'
Notification.Description: The StaticName of a Field should be unique in the farm.

Notification.Name: DefineUniqueFieldStaticName
Notification.Message: Attribute 'StaticName' of Field 'HiddenPageField' in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_InternalFields' is used multiple times. Field HiddenPageField in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_InternalFields' uses same StaticName 'HiddenPageField'
Notification.Description: The StaticName of a Field should be unique in the farm.

Notification.Name: DeployMissingUrlActionFileOfCustomAction
Notification.Message: Deploy missing file '~site/_layouts/EnterPageName.aspx?ItemUrl={ItemUrl}&ListId={ListId}' in CustomAction 'CustomActionContentTypePage'.
Notification.Description: If a CustomAction references a file in attribute 'UrlAction' (e.g. ASPX page) the file must be deployed. Otherwise a click on this CustomAction will lead to 404 error.

Notification.Name: DoNotModifyWebAppSettings
Notification.Message: Do not call property 'set_AlertsMaximumQuerySet' of a SharePoint WebApplication in method 'Test1', class 'MyCompany.Intranet.Components.SPFarmModifications'. WebApplication should only be modified by an administrator or via PowerShell.
Notification.Description: Do not change properties of the SPWebApplication object and do not call methods that modify the SPWebApplication configuration. Such changes should be done only by the farm administrator or should be part of a deployment script e.g. with PowerShell.

Notification.Name: DoNotActivateWebAppFeatures
Notification.Message: Do not activate a WebApp feature via code. Activate WebApp features during the deployment of a solution e.g. via PowerShell.
Notification.Description: Do not activate or deactivate features with WebApplication scope. This operation should only be done by the farm administrator or should be part of a deployment script e.g. with PowerShell.

Notification.Name: DeclareTitleAndDescriptionInSolutions
Notification.Message: Add attribute 'Title' to Solution 'MyCompany.Intranet.Components.wsp'.
Notification.Description: To make it easier to identify Solutions in the Solution Gallery in SharePoint the attributes 'Title' and 'Description' should be declared.

Notification.Name: DeclareTitleAndDescriptionInSolutions
Notification.Message: Add attribute 'Description' to Solution 'MyCompany.Intranet.Components.wsp'.
Notification.Description: To make it easier to identify Solutions in the Solution Gallery in SharePoint the attributes 'Title' and 'Description' should be declared.

Notification.Name: MakeFeaturesWithScopeFarmOrWebAppVisible
Notification.Message: Make Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_HttpModulePage' visible.
Notification.Description: Feature of scope 'Farm' or 'WebApplication' should not be hidden. They are not visible for the farm administrator in the Central Administration and cannot be deactivated via the UI e.g. in case of problems. If the feature is visible in the Central Administration the farm administrator can easier identify available and activated features.

Notification.Name: MakeFeaturesWithScopeSiteOrWebHidden
Notification.Message: Consider to make Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_Actions' hidden.
Notification.Description: Consider to make Features with scope 'Web' or 'Site' hidden to avoid activation via the UI.

Notification.Name: MakeFeaturesWithScopeSiteOrWebHidden
Notification.Message: Consider to make Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_InternalFields' hidden.
Notification.Description: Consider to make Features with scope 'Web' or 'Site' hidden to avoid activation via the UI.

Notification.Name: DoNotCallListItemsAddToAddItems
Notification.Message: Do not call SPList.Items.Add() in method 'EnsureFolder', class 'MyCompany.Intranet.Components.CustomCode.Supression'. Use SPList.AddItem() instead.
Notification.Description: Do not call SPList.Items.Add. Use SPList.AddItem instead.

Notification.Name: DoNotUseListItemsCount
Notification.Message: Do not use SPList.Items.Count in method 'TestWithError', class 'MyCompany.Intranet.Components.SPListItemsCount'. Use SPList.ItemCount instead.
Notification.Description: Do not call SPList.Items.Count. Use SPList.ItemCount instead.

Notification.Name: DoNotUseGetPublishingPages
Notification.Message: Do not call PublishingWeb.GetPublishingPages() in method 'CreateNewPage', class 'MyCompany.Intranet.Components.CustomCode.PublishingWebTest'. Use PublishingWeb.GetPublishingPages(SPQuery query) or PublishingWeb.GetPublishingPages(uint rowLimit) instead. Use the alternative methods especially to get all pages including pages in subfolders.
Notification.Description: Do not call PublishingWeb.GetPublishingPages(). Use PublishingWeb.GetPublishingPages(SPQuery query) or PublishingWeb.GetPublishingPages(uint rowLimit) instead to improve performance and limit the number of returned pages. Note: PublishingWeb.GetPublishingPages() does not return pages inside subfolders. Use then PublishingWeb.GetPublishingPages(SPQuery query) instead.

Notification.Name: DoNotActivateFeaturesViaAPI
Notification.Message: Do not activate or deactivate Features via API in method 'Test1', class 'MyCompany.Intranet.Components.SPFarmModifications'. Consider using PowerShell or Feature Stapling.
Notification.Description: Do not activate or deactivate Features in code via API. Consider using PowerShell or Feature Stapling.

Notification.Name: ConsiderAllowDeletionInField
Notification.Message: Consider setting the attribute 'AllowDeletion' in Field 'InternalField3' and set the value to FALSE.
Notification.Description: Setting the attribute 'AllowDeletion' to FALSE prevents unintended deletion of a Field by the user or administrator.

Notification.Name: ConsiderAllowDeletionInField
Notification.Message: Consider setting the attribute 'AllowDeletion' in Field 'HiddenPageField' and set the value to FALSE.
Notification.Description: Setting the attribute 'AllowDeletion' to FALSE prevents unintended deletion of a Field by the user or administrator.

Notification.Name: ConsiderAllowDeletionInField
Notification.Message: Consider setting the attribute 'AllowDeletion' in Field 'HiddenPageField' and set the value to FALSE.
Notification.Description: Setting the attribute 'AllowDeletion' to FALSE prevents unintended deletion of a Field by the user or administrator.

Notification.Name: ConsiderAllowDeletionInField
Notification.Message: Consider setting the attribute 'AllowDeletion' in Field 'InternalField' and set the value to FALSE.
Notification.Description: Setting the attribute 'AllowDeletion' to FALSE prevents unintended deletion of a Field by the user or administrator.

Notification.Name: DoNotResetWebServer
Notification.Message: Do not set 'ResetWebServer' to TRUE in solution 'MyCompany.Intranet.Components.wsp'.
Notification.Description: A solution should not reset the webserver.

Notification.Name: DefineRecycleForResetWebServerModeOnUpgrade
Notification.Message: Specify 'Recycle' in attribute 'ResetWebServerModeOnUpgrade' in Solution 'MyCompany.Intranet.Components.wsp'.
Notification.Description: To reduce the downtime of a SharePoint farm during deployment the solution should not use default setting 'StartStop' for upgrading solutions. Spedifying 'Recycle' only recycles affected application pools and will not stop them.

Notification.Name: DoNotDeployAssemblyWithDebugMode
Notification.Message: Build assembly 'MyCompany.Intranet.Components.dll' in RELEASE mode.
Notification.Description: Assembly should be build with RELEASE mode. Main reason is to prevent running code which is defined within #DEBUG preprocessor directive and which typically should not run in productive environments.

Notification.Name: DoNotDeploySPWebConfigModificationsViaFeatures
Notification.Message: Do not deploy SPWebConfigModifications in Feature 'HttpModulePageEventReceiver'.
Notification.Description: Deployment of SPWebConfigModifications with a feature receiver should be avoided. The activation of this feature will start a timer job and will initiate the restart of services which may lead to problems during a deployment. Consider deploying of SPWebConfigModifications via PowerShell script or supplemental config file.

Notification.Name: DoNotDeploySPWebConfigModificationsViaFeatures
Notification.Message: Do not deploy SPWebConfigModifications in Feature 'HttpModulePageEventReceiver'.

Notification.Name: InheritContentTypeFromExistingParentContentType
Notification.Message: The parent ContentType '0x010100EED05E02DB9F4831932432C1B47334B2' of ContentType 'MyContentType' (ID: '0x010100EED05E02DB9F4831932432C1B47334B201') could not be found. Change the ContentType and inherit from an existing ContentType or remove this ContentType. If the parent ContentType is created via API (e.g. in a FeatureReceiver) consider to create also all inherited ContentTypes via API.
Notification.Description: The parent ContentType of a ContentType must be either a SharePoint ContentType or a ContentType within the WSP solutions.

Notification.Name: AvoidCommentsInsideContentType
Notification.Message: Avoid comments inside ContentType 'PublicLocalPage'.
Notification.Description: Comments inside the ContentType definition (XML) can break loading them.

Notification.Name: DoNotDeployTaxonomyFieldsInListDefinition
Notification.Message: Do not deploy taxonomy field [MyTaxonomyField] using ListTemplate 'PublicPages'.
Notification.Description: Taxonomy fields should be deployed by content types, not inside ListTemplates.

Notification.Name: DeclareDefaultDescriptionInListDefinition
Notification.Message: Declare element 'DefaultDescription' in schema of ListTemplate 'Basic List'.
Notification.Description: The element 'DefaultDescription' must be declared in the schema.xml of a ListTemplate.

Notification.Name: DeclareRequiredAttributesInListDefinition
Notification.Message: Declare element 'Name' in schema of ListTemplate 'Basic List'.
Notification.Description: The attribute 'Title', 'Name' and 'Direction' must be declared in the schema.xml of a ListTemplate.

Notification.Name: AddValidateFormDigestToASPXPage
Notification.Message: Add 'SharePoint:FormDigest' to ASPX page 'CorePageLayout\CorePageLayout.aspx'.
Notification.Description: ASPX pages should contain 'SharePoint:FormDigest' to ensure security validation of requests,

Notification.Name: DeclareAttributeInheritsInContentType
Notification.Message: Add attribute 'Inherits' to ContentType 'MyContentType'.
Notification.Description: In SharePoint 2010 the new attribute 'Inherits' for ContentTypes defines whether fields of the parent ContentType are inherited to the ContentType. For compatibility reasons to SharePoint 2007 this attribute should be specified.

Notification.Name: AvoidInlineCSSInASPXPage
Notification.Message: Avoid inline CSS code in page 'CorePageLayout\CorePageLayout.aspx'. Use separate .CSS files instead.
Notification.Description: ASPX pages should not contain CSS code. Use separate .CSS files instead.

Notification.Name: AvoidInlineCSSInASPXPage
Notification.Message: Avoid inline CSS code in page 'CorePageLayout\CorePageLayout.aspx'. Use separate .CSS files instead.
Notification.Description: ASPX pages should not contain CSS code. Use separate .CSS files instead.

Notification.Name: ConsiderAllowDeletionInField
Notification.Message: Consider setting the attribute 'AllowDeletion' in Field 'MyTaxonomyField' and set the value to FALSE.
Notification.Description: Setting the attribute 'AllowDeletion' to FALSE prevents unintended deletion of a Field by the user or administrator.

Notification.Name: ConsiderSealedInContentType
Notification.Message: Consider setting the attribute 'Sealed' in ContentType 'MyContentType' and set the value to TRUE.
Notification.Description: Setting the attribute 'Sealed' to TRUE prevents unintended changes of a ContentType by the user or administrator.

Notification.Name: ConsiderSealedInContentType
Notification.Message: Consider setting the attribute 'Sealed' in ContentType 'PublicLocalPage' and set the value to TRUE.
Notification.Description: Setting the attribute 'Sealed' to TRUE prevents unintended changes of a ContentType by the user or administrator.

Notification.Name: AddEnsureFolderContentTypeInListDefinition
Notification.Message: Add ContentType '0x0120' for folders to ListTemplate 'PublicPages'.
Notification.Description: A custom ListTemplate should contain the folder ContentType to work properly.

Notification.Name: AvoidContentTypesInListDefinitions
Notification.Message: Do not define the ContentType 'MyContentType' directly in ListTemplate 'PublicPages'. Better define the ContentType separately and reference it in the ListTemplate.
Notification.Description: ContentTypes which are defined in a ListTemplate are not re-usable. Better define the ContentType separately and reference the ContentType in the ListTemplate.

Notification.Name: ConsiderAllowDeletionInListTemplate
Notification.Message: Consider setting the attribute 'AllowDeletion' in ListTemplate 'PublicPages' and set the value to FALSE.
Notification.Description: Setting the attribute 'AllowDeletion' to FALSE prevents unintended deletion of a ListTemplate by the user or administrator.

Notification.Name: DoNotDeploySolutionGlobally
Notification.Message: Consider to deploy solution 'MyCompany.Intranet.FrontEnd.wsp' per web application and not globally.
Notification.Description: Solution should not be deployed globally to reduce the impact of the solution for the SharePoint farm. Note: this guidance does not apply to SharePoint 2013 and further.

Notification.Name: DefineRecycleForResetWebServerModeOnUpgrade
Notification.Message: Specify 'Recycle' in attribute 'ResetWebServerModeOnUpgrade' in Solution 'MyCompany.Intranet.FrontEnd.wsp'.
Notification.Description: To reduce the downtime of a SharePoint farm during deployment the solution should not use default setting 'StartStop' for upgrading solutions. Spedifying 'Recycle' only recycles affected application pools and will not stop them.

Notification.Name: DoNotDeployAssemblyWithDebugMode

Notification.Description: Assembly should be build with RELEASE mode. Main reason is to prevent running code which is defined within #DEBUG preprocessor directive and which typically should not run in productive environments.

Notification.Name: DoNotDeployEmptyAssemblies
Notification.Message: Remove Assembly 'MyCompany.Intranet.FrontEnd.dll' from Solution because it is empty.
Notification.Description: Assemblies without custom classes should not be deployed to SharePoint. This helps to reduce unneeded IISResets during deployment.

Notification.Name: DoNotDeployEmptyElementManifests
Notification.Message: The ElementManifest 'PublicGlobalPage\Elements.xml' in Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_PublicPage' contains no elements. Remove the ElementManifest from the Feature because it has no purpose.
Notification.Description: ElementManifests files in Features which do not contain any element have no purpose and should be removed from the solution.

Notification.Description: All localizable attributes of SharePoint artifacts like ContentType, Feature etc. should use resources.

Notification.Name: DisposeCreatedSPSiteObject
Notification.Message: Dispose created SPSite in method 'ItemUpdating', class 'MyCompany.Intranet.BaseContentTypes.LocalPageEventReceivers'.
Notification.Description: When you create a SPSite object with a new operator, the creating application must dispose of it.

Notification.Name: DisposeSPWebCreatedByOpenWeb
Notification.Message: Dispose created SPWeb returned by SPSite.OpenWeb in method 'ItemUpdating', class 'MyCompany.Intranet.BaseContentTypes.LocalPageEventReceivers'.
Notification.Description: The OpenWeb method create an SPWeb object and return it to the caller. This new object is not stored in the SPSite object and is not disposed of anywhere in the SPSite class. For this reason, you should dispose of any object created via these methods.

Notification.Name: DeclareTitleAndDescriptionInSolutions
Notification.Message: Add attribute 'Title' to Solution 'MyCompany.Intranet.WebParts.wsp'.
Notification.Description: To make it easier to identify Solutions in the Solution Gallery in SharePoint the attributes 'Title' and 'Description' should be declared.

Notification.Name: DeclareTitleAndDescriptionInSolutions
Notification.Message: Add attribute 'Description' to Solution 'MyCompany.Intranet.WebParts.wsp'.
Notification.Description: To make it easier to identify Solutions in the Solution Gallery in SharePoint the attributes 'Title' and 'Description' should be declared.

Notification.Name: DoNotInheritWebPartsFromSharePoint
Notification.Message: Do not inherit Webpart 'SharePointWebPartPages' from Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.WebPart in Assembly 'MyCompany.Intranet.WebParts.dll'. Inherit from System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.
Notification.Description: WebParts should be inherited from the ASP.NET Webpart (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart). Do not inherit from the SharePoint WebPart.

Notification.Name: MakeFeaturesWithScopeSiteOrWebHidden
Notification.Message: Consider to make Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_SimpleWorkflow' hidden.
Notification.Description: Consider to make Features with scope 'Web' or 'Site' hidden to avoid activation via the UI.

Notification.Name: MakeFeaturesWithScopeSiteOrWebHidden
Notification.Message: Consider to make Feature 'MyCompany_Intranet_Webparts' hidden.
Notification.Description: Consider to make Features with scope 'Web' or 'Site' hidden to avoid activation via the UI.

Notification.Name: DeclareAllowCloseInWebPart
Notification.Message: Webpart 'SharePointWebPartPages.webpart' should contain property 'AllowClose=False'.
Notification.Description: A WebPart should contain the attribute 'AllowClose' with value False to prevent that users close the webpart. In this case the webpart would be disappear from the UI but will remain inside the page.

Notification.Name: DeclareAllowCloseInWebPart
Notification.Message: Webpart 'ASPWebPartPages.webpart' should contain property 'AllowClose=False'.
Notification.Description: A WebPart should contain the attribute 'AllowClose' with value False to prevent that users close the webpart. In this case the webpart would be disappear from the UI but will remain inside the page.

Notification.Name: DefineRecycleForResetWebServerModeOnUpgrade
Notification.Message: Specify 'Recycle' in attribute 'ResetWebServerModeOnUpgrade' in Solution 'MyCompany.Intranet.WebParts.wsp'.
Notification.Description: To reduce the downtime of a SharePoint farm during deployment the solution should not use default setting 'StartStop' for upgrading solutions. Spedifying 'Recycle' only recycles affected application pools and will not stop them.

Notification.Name: DoNotDeployAssemblyWithDebugMode
Notification.Message: Build assembly 'MyCompany.Intranet.WebParts.dll' in RELEASE mode.
Notification.Description: Assembly should be build with RELEASE mode. Main reason is to prevent running code which is defined within #DEBUG preprocessor directive and which typically should not run in productive environments.
